name: Mushroom Island 🍄
description:
mushroom island! an adventure game where you, the player, finds yourself on a mysterious island with amnesia. needing a way to survive, you begin to collect mushrooms. along the way, you find and, maybe, befriend creatures as you try to get off the island.

created by mushroom masters during COSMOS 2021 in Cluster 5*: 

  • Ryan
  • Alyssa
  • Mukund
  • Jordan

*links open in a new tab <3
